goal.ch: 了解惡性腫瘤轉移的分子機轉與研究方法
goal.en: Help students understand the molecular mechanisms of cancer metastasis and research approaches.

outline.ch:
“1. 原位癌與遠端轉移癌
2. 癌轉移治療與預後
3. 癌轉移成因探討
4. 癌轉移分子機制(一)
5. 癌轉移分子機制(二)
6. 實驗室癌侵犯行為研究方法“
outline.en:
“1. Primary tumor versus metastatic tumor
2. Treatment and prognosis of metastatic cancers
3. Epidemiology of metastases
4. Molecular mechanisms of cancer metastasis (1)
5. Molecular mechanisms of cancer metastasis (2)
6. Research methodology“

en.competencies: Learn the basics of mathematics, physics, chemistry, medicine, biology and their applications in healthcare
